template <typename Block>
struct vsip::impl::Expr_block_storage
File: ../../../vsip/core/block_traits.hpp

Traits class to determine how an expression block will refer to its operand blocks.

By default, blocks should be refered to by reference.

However, scalar blocks need to be held by-value, as they are implicitely constructed by operators.

Specializations:
Expr_block_storage<expr::Scalar>
